summary: Twins, separated at birth and living opposite lives, are about to learn of each other- and the substantial inheritance they are entitled to.
cast: Matthew Modine|Lara Flynn Boyle|Fred Ward|Tyra Ferrell|Marisa Tomei|Kevin J. O'Connor|Tate Donovan|Lori Singer|M. Emmet Walsh|Gailard Sartain|Tony Genaro|Angel Aviles|Dirk Blocker|Debra Dusay|Les Podewell|Robert Gould|Kirsten Ellickson|Pat Clemons|Meegan Lee Ochs|Carlos Sanz|Lenora Finley|Isabell O'Connor|Campbell De Silva|Tom Kasat|Diane Wheeler-Nicholson|Paul Meshejian|Shirley Venard|Rebecca Sabot|Willis Burks II|Pancho Demmings|Jack Walsh|Martin Marinaro|Elizabeth Gray|Wayne A. Evenson|Randy Gust|Matthew Dudley|John Sargent|Frank Davis|Mark Modine|Ken Earl|Chris George|Kerry Hoyt|Suzette Tarzia|Craig Hosking|Susan Chambers|Vinnie Curto|Amy Fisher|David Lind|Joel Thingvall
title: Equinox
